div.h2: HSPC Service Delivery Location Condition code system

div.p: The list of codes that describe how the data came into being.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/fpar/CodeSystem/locationCondition defines the following codes:

tr.td: The assigned service delivery location is currently dirty, awaiting cleaning.
The assigned service delivery location has been cleaned, awaiting occupancy.
The assigned service delivery location is currently occupied.

name.value: HSPC Service Delivery Location Condition code system

description.value: The list of codes that describe how the data came into being.

definition.value: The assigned service delivery location is currently dirty, awaiting cleaning.
The assigned service delivery location has been cleaned, awaiting occupancy.
The assigned service delivery location is currently occupied.
